title: Morphological Profiling for Drug Discovery in the Era of Deep Learning. (arXiv:2312.07899v2 [q-bio.QM] UPDATED)
abstract: Morphological profiling is a valuable tool in phenotypic drug discovery. The advent of high-throughput automated imaging has enabled the capturing of a wide range of morphological features of cells or organisms in response to perturbations at the single-cell resolution. Concurrently, significant advances in machine learning and deep learning, especially in computer vision, have led to substantial improvements in analyzing large-scale high-content images at high-throughput. These efforts have facilitated understanding of compound mechanism-of-action (MOA), drug repurposing, characterization of cell morphodynamics under perturbation, and ultimately contributing to the development of novel therapeutics. In this review, we provide a comprehensive overview of the recent advances in the field of morphological profiling. translated_title: 深度学习时代的药物发现中的形态学特征分析
translated_abstract: 形态学特征分析是表型药物发现中的有价值工具。高通量自动成像的出现使得能够以单细胞分辨率捕捉细胞或生物体对干扰的形态学特征的广泛范围。与此同时，机器学习和深度学习，尤其是计算机视觉领域的重大进展，使得在高通量下分析大规模高内容图像的能力得到了显著提高。这些努力促进了对化合物作用机制、药物再利用、干扰下细胞形态动力学特征的了解，并最终有助于新治疗方法的开发。在本综述中，我们全面概述了形态学特征分析领域的最新进展。我们总结了图像分析工作流程，调查了包括特征工程和基于深度学习的分析策略在内的广泛范围的分析策略，并讨论了在这一领域的潜在应用。
tldr: 形态学特征分析在表型药物发现中具有重要价值。深度学习技术在分析大规模高内容图像方面取得了显著进展，促进了药物作用机制的理解和新治疗方法的开发。
en_tdlr: Morphological profiling is a valuable tool in phenotypic drug discovery. Advances in deep learning have significantly improved the analysis of large-scale high-content images, contributing to a better understanding of compound mechanism-of-action and the development of novel therapeutics.
